library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(mgcv)
library(reshape2)


folder_path<-'/Users/jdh/Library/CloudStorage/GoogleDrive-jakehosen@gmail.com/My Drive/RRIV/FlowSensor/Atmosphere Tests/tr-a-002_10thJan-13thJan2025'

tr_a_002_20250110 <-
    list.files(path = folder_path,
               pattern = "\\.CSV$",
               full.names = T) %>%
    map_df(~read_csv(., col_types = cols(.default = "c"),skip=0))

tr_a_002_20250110_t<-as.data.frame(tr_a_002_20250110[,c(1:7)])

tr_a_002_20250110_m<-melt(tr_a_002_20250110_t,id.vars="timestamp")


tr_a_002_20250110_m$value<-as.numeric(tr_a_002_20250110_m$value)
tr_a_002_20250110_m$timestamp<-as.numeric(tr_a_002_20250110_m$timestamp)

pdf("~/test.pdf")
ggplot(tr_a_002_20250110_m,aes(timestamp,value,color=variable))+
geom_point()
dev.off()


png("~/test.png")
ggplot(tr_a_002_20250110_m,aes(timestamp,value,color=variable))+
geom_point()
dev.off()
